title: 16b06 - Creditor’s attorney fees.
text:
A creditor’s attorney fees
may be collected through a wage garnishment order, when allowed by state law.
The attorney fees are not considered to be required by law when determining disposable
earnings. They are subject to the CCPA sec 303(a) limits on garnishment
amounts. (See FOH 16b0lb(12).)
html: A creditor’s attorney fees may be collected through a wage garnishment order, when allowed by state law. The attorney fees are not considered to be required by law when determining disposable earnings. They are subject to the CCPA sec 303(a) limits on garnishment amounts. (See FOH 16b0lb(12).)
